petitionerArgument.violatedCode: CSFRA Section 1707(d) and Chapter 7, Section C of Regulations
petitionerArgument.summaryOfViolation: Undue tenant hardship due to inadequate household income relative to rent increases

petitions.reimbursement: Rent increase amount for Oct 7-9, 2022 and reduction of banked increases after Oct 10, 2022
petitions.rentAdjustment: Yes (reduction of banked increases beyond 5% AGA)

rationale.respondentHadNotice: Yes, through proper petition filing on September 9, 2022
rationale.evidenceAssessment: Tenant proved income below 100% AMI threshold through tax returns and testimony
rationale.impactAssessment: Tenant's household income qualified for hardship protection under regulations

petitions.respondent: Del Medio Manor LLC/Calson Property Management
